channel.title: Blog RSS Feed
channel.description: This is where I post stuff about indie hacking and tech entrepreneurship!

item.title: Indie Hacker: The beginning
item.description: To create is to live twice. - Albert Camus Create. Not for the money. Not for the fame. Not for the recognition. But for the pure joy of creating something and sharing it.

item.title: Turning a static PWA React application into custom native apps for customers
item.description: All businesses registered on StudioYou get their own webstore domain (eg. fitnessfirst.getstudioyou.com) where their customers can book classes, personal training, and buy memberships and packs. We developed the webstore in React. For people whoâ€¦
